title: Eminem questioned by Secret Service over lyrics 'threatening' Ivanka Trump
text:
Eminem was questioned by the Secret Service over lyrics which were “threatening” towards Ivanka Trump, the agency has confirmed.

The Detroit-born rapper, whose real name is Marshall Mathers, was contacted by the presidential team after his song Framed was released in December 2017.

Eminem raps: “Donald Duck’s on as the Tonka Truck in the yard.

“But dog, how the **** is Ivanka Trump in the trunk of my car?

“Cause I feel somewhat responsible for the dumb little blonde girl, that ************* baton twirler that got dumped in the pond, second murder with no recollection of it.”
description: Eminem was questioned by the Secret Service over lyrics which were “threatening” towards Ivanka Trump, the agency has confirmed.
